title: World Cup 2022: Lionel Messi keeps Argentina dreams alive after scoring in 1,000th game
description: On his 1,000th appearance in professional football, Lionel Messi stepped up again to keep Argentina's World Cup dream alive.

title: England in West Indies: The challenges ahead for new coach Jon Lewis
description: Jon Lewis is set to take charge of England for the first time on their tour of the Caribbean - what challenges does he face in the role?

title: Tyson Fury v Derek Chisora: The 'Gypsy King' retains WBC heavyweight world title as Oleksandr Usyk watches ringside
description: Tyson Fury retains his WBC world heavyweight title with a brutal stoppage of Derek Chisora and set up an undisputed showdown with Oleksandr Usyk.

title: St Edward's Crown leaves Tower of London ahead of Coronation
description: The 17th Century crown has been removed from the Tower of London to be altered for the Coronation.

title: Coding: Female engineers deleting myth that tech is for men
description: Huge growth in technology means women are desperately needed to fill more jobs, businesses say.

title: Lionel Messi: Rio Ferdinand calls display for Argentina against Australia 'best' of World Cup 2022
description: Rio Ferdinand describes Lionel Messi's game against Australia as the "best individual performance" of the World Cup, as Argentina won 2-1 to reach the quarter-finals.

title: Police watchdog head Michael Lockwood resigns amid investigation
description: The home secretary says Michael Lockwood is the subject of a probe into an "historic allegation".

title: World Cup 2022: Argentina 2-1 Australia: Lionel Messi scores in 1,000th game
description: Lionel Messi produces a moment of magic in his 1,000th career game as Argentina beat Australia to reach the World Cup quarter-finals.

description: Watch highlights as goals from Lionel Messi and Julian Alvarez help Argentina reach the quarter-finals with victory against a spirited Australia side.

title: Eurovision star Sam Ryder appeared in Cardiff on Saturday
description: The Eurovision star played live for people in Cardiff Bay on Saturday.

title: England v Senegal: Gareth Southgate says 'favourites' tag means nothing before last-16 tie
description: Gareth Southgate says England's tag as 'favourites' means nothing as the Three Lions prepare to face Senegal in the World Cup last-16 in Qatar.

title: World Cup 2022: Netherlands boss Louis van Gaal counters critics by reaching quarter-finals

title: Cyril Ramaphosa: South Africa leader won't resign, says spokesman
description: Cyril Ramaphosa is accused of keeping large sums of cash on his farm then covering up its theft.

title: Ukraine war: Russia says it will not accept oil price cap
description: The measure - due to come into force on Monday - intensifies pressure on Russia over the Ukraine invasion.

description: BBC pundit Jermaine Jenas explains why Senegal have a winning mentality after enjoying two huge triumphs already this year.

title: Leicester 0-8 Chelsea: Leaders pile misery on struggling Foxes with ruthless display

title: World Cup 2022: Daley Blind doubles Netherlands lead against USA

title: Pakistan v England: Tourists' toil with the ball as important as batting records

title: Viking Polaris: Passenger killed after 'rogue wave' hits cruise ship

title: World Cup 2022: Brazil's Gabriel Jesus and Alex Telles ruled out of rest of tournament with injuries
